    • Method Detail

      • threatened

        public static boolean threatened(int x,
                                 int y,
                                 char color)
        Checks to see if a space is being threatened by an opposing piece.

        "Threatened" here means that an opposing piece can capture a piece at this location in the current player's possession on the next turn.

        Parameters:
        x - - x-coordinate of space to be checked.
        y - - y-coordinate of space to be checked.
        color - - color of the opposing pieces that can threaten the space.
        Returns:
        true if space is being threatened, false if not.

      • threatenedByNonKings

        public static boolean threatenedByNonKings(int x,
                                           int y,
                                           char color)
        Checks to see if a space is being threatened by an opposing piece that isn't a king.

        "Threatened" here means that an opposing piece can capture a piece at this location in the current player's possession on the next turn.

        Parameters:
        x - - x-coordinate of space to be checked.
        y - - y-coordinate of space to be checked.
        color - - color of the opposing pieces that can threaten the space.
        Returns:
        true if space is being threatened, false if not.

      • isLegal

        public static boolean isLegal(boolean player)
        Checks to see if the input move is legal.

        Calls canMove on the Piece object located at the position indicated.

        Parameters:
        player - - current player
        Returns:
        if move is legal, returns true.

      • isCheckmate

        public static boolean isCheckmate(boolean player)
        Checks if a move by the player put the opponent in checkmate
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who moved the piece in question
        Returns:
        whether the player has put the opponent in checkmate

      • isCheck

        public static boolean isCheck(boolean player)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        whether the player has put the opponent in check

      • isStalemate

        public static boolean isStalemate(boolean player)
        Checks for stalemate.
        Parameters:
        player - - the current player
        Returns:
        whether the given player is in stalemate

      • move

        public static void move(Piece p1,
                        Piece p2)
        Moves a piece according to user input, assumes legality.
        Parameters:
        p1 - - Piece to be moved.
        p2 - - Piece being moved to.

      • promote

        public static void promote(Piece p)
        Promotes a pawn to the chosen piece based on input.

        Defaults to queen if unspecified.

        Parameters:
        p - the piece to be promoted

      • initBoard

        public static void initBoard()
        Initializes the board state to the start of a new game.

      • printBoard

        public static void printBoard()
        Prints the current state of the board in ASCII art.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Creates and displays an ASCII game of chess
        Parameters:
